title: Quarkus 2.2.2.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.2.2.Final, a maintenance release for our 2.2 release train containing bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.2. If you are not using 2.2 already, please refer to the 2.2 migration guide. Full changelog You can get the full changelog...
